review: The Fire TV Stick has been for very little use in my case because it's fabricated to only work in the US andI live in the Dominican Republic. The only use I have for it right now is for youtube.Even your prime membership si very limited, I tried itfor a month and did not have much use for it either, only for free shipping.Please reconsider.
author: Amazon Customer

review: The best device ever! This is awesome for a TV that a gaming console is not hooked up to; or you can not hard wire internet to the TV! I do not know how I lived without it! So many choices there is no need to even go to Redbox anymore! This is the Best!
author: Pamela R Rickard

review: Can't believe we lived without this.
author: wellness massage

review: quirky and strange to find what you are looking for....GUI needs work
author: the general

review: Love this little gizmo.  Very easy to set up and use.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I prefer the roku, the interface is more simplified, but for the price at the initial lightning deal ($20) this is well worth it.
author: Abby Road

review: Bought it strictly for sling tv and i have gone to buy a second. I love it works great easy to navigate.

review: We love it so far no complaints.
